Name: Oracle 11g
Trigger: CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER ? BEFORE ? ON ? FOR EACH ROW DECLARE E_except Exception
Warning: EXCEPTION when E_except then raise_application_error(-2000, ?); END;
Error: EXCEPTION when E_except then raise_application_error(-2000, ?); END;
TriggerCompare: BEGIN IF (!(? ? ?)) THEN E_exception; END IF;
TriggerRange: BEGIN IF(!(? ? ? AND ?)) THEN E_exception; END IF;
